name: Darkest side of the moon
description:
The idea of the project was to create a game with branching narrative. 

It's meant to be seen as a prototype and not a finished game. 

Known bugs: going back to a screen that gives you an item will create infinite duplicates of that item (as seen in the very first screen if the player checks out the map and/or the inventory and go back to the first screen)

Spoilers: there's one hidden ending that requires playing the game twice. You'll know if you find it (and I would love for you to let me know in the comments if you do!)
